articles.description: Accenture has acquired Melbourne-based AWS and Microsoft partner Olikka as part of its effort to invest US$3B in its cloud business over the next three years.
articles.content:
Olikka's Ross Gangemi and Michael Pascoe
Credit: Olikka 
Accenture has acquired Melbourne-based AWS and Microsoft partner Olikka.
